title: Gross savings (% of GDP)
name: ny.gns.ictr.zs
readme: Gross savings are calculated as gross national income less total consumption, plus net transfers.

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Gross savings are calculated as gross national income less total consumption, plus net transfers.
